NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "All of us here probably all know who I'm talking about," he told the panel of high-flying journalists, alluding to a rumour that has long circulated in media circles. Asked if he had any proof, he said: "Of course not. But I have testimony from cabinet members at the highest level, state authorities at the highest level." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR He said the affair was detailed to him at the top of government, "particularly by the prime minister".
